siteDescription: Welcome to Voidbox, a digital archive documenting a programmer's journey through the bleeding-edge of technology. Dive in and explore this realm of accessible wisdom and inspiration.
author: Apinant U-suwantim

hero.title: Digital archive
hero.description:
transforming fleeting thoughts into lasting blogs. 
 Enjoy your journey through Voidbox!

articles.title: Articles
articles.quote:
"As wisdom grows and knowledge flows,
 the more we learn, the less we know." -

aboutSite.title: What is this !?
aboutSite.description: born from the struggle of retaining and accessing my learning and coding experiences, Voidbox serves as my digital archive. Here, I share my journey through the bleeding-edge of technology, capturing and transforming fleeting knowledge into accessible wisdom. May Voidbox guide you in your coding journey, much like a compass in the vast ocean of technology.

aboutAuthor.title: Apinant U-suwantim (Moo)
aboutAuthor.description: Hello, I'm Moo I'm an enthusiastic developer and programmer based in Thailand, with a growing interest in languages and tools like Rust, Go, Lua, Astro, Cloud-related and many more along the way.. Presently, I am focused on my day job while dedicating my spare time to building a blog website to share my thoughts and the knowledge I've accumulated.

newSletter.title: Subscribe to our newsletter and stay up to date!
newSletter.subDescription: We care about the protection of your data.
